Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 42 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 159[Air Date: 7/15/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 42 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 159[Air Date: 7/15/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Hollywood, Florida drops mandatory HTLV testing2.New Orleans Archdioceses donates AIDS shelter for their 80 AIDS cases3. David Dinkens runs for borough PresidentCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp4. Human Rights Campaign survey got gay and lesbian discrimination5. Dallas, Texas reportCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals6. University of Texas and "April 12th Round-up Parade" that injured gay and lesbian students7. Andy Humm reports on gay couple held hostage on Flight 847COMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity with actor Jack Albertson8. Harvey Milk High School9. Long Beach Gay Pride Parade refused permit10. Gay Pride coverageCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection"Sports reportHealthline: GMHC seminar: The Challenge of AIDS Continues/ Nathan Fain speech "Dream, Tragedy, and the Birth of Courage"
The Right Stuff:1. A look at mainstream TV coverage of NYC Gay Pride Day2. Segment from "The Phil Donohue Show," topic: developing sex organs in human fetusCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" magazine3. Broadway Confidential: "Singin' in the Rain" review with performance footage4. Sybil Bruncheon at NYC Gay PrideCOMMERCIAL: Arcos Blancos resort, Puerto Rico5 .Interview with Damian Charles, author of Jane Mansfield biography
